description: Erection of 2no. side dormer roof extensions
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated, on the balance of probabilities, that the cubic content of the resulting roof space of the proposed roof extensions, together with the existing roof extensions (not being part of the original house) would not exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more than 50 cubic metres. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph B1.(d) (ii) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: No objections.
